data.about: I am an associate professor in Department of Computer Science at National Chiao Tung University, HsinChu, Taiwan. I lead the Networking and Sensing Systems (NSS) Lab at NCTU. I received the B.S. degree in Computer Science, National Tsing Hua University in 2003, and the Ph.D. degree in Graduate Institute of Networking and Multimedia, National Taiwan University in 2009. I was a visiting scholar at CSAIL, MIT from Mar. 2007 to Mar. 2008 and from Oct. 2010 to Mar. 2011. My research interests include wireless systems, multimedia networking, visible light communications, and internet of things.
data.notice: Please visit NSS Labortary for more details about our group. We welcome self-motivated students to join us! If you are interested, please email me you CV.
